content:
Suppose a small business is looking to enhance their online presence and attract more customers. Based on your experience, what are four content marketing strategies you would suggest to them? Please present your suggestions in a table format as shown below:
| Strategy | Description | Example |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Blogging | Consistently creating and sharing informative blog posts to drive traffic to the website | A pet store creating blog posts on topics such as pet care, adoption, and grooming |
| Social media marketing | Utilizing social media platforms to engage with potential customers and promote the brand | A local bakery sharing pictures of their fresh-baked goods and customer reviews on Instagram and Facebook |
| Email marketing | Sending newsletters and promotional emails to subscribers to keep them updated on the latest products and offers | An online fashion boutique sending personalized emails to customers based on their purchase history and preferences |
| Video marketing | Creating engaging video content to showcase products, services, or brand values | A fitness studio sharing workout videos and success stories of their clients on YouTube and Instagram TV |
